Color.UseColormapForOtherAgents: Flag to enable color map for other agents
Color.IfColormapUseLineColorOthers: Flag to enable that line color can be fixed for other agents while using colormap

Agents.DrawBehaviorPlanEvalAgent: Draw behavior plan of evalauted agent
Agents.DrawEvalGoals: Draw Route of eval agent goals
Agents.DrawHistory: Draw history with alpha trace for each agent
Agents.DrawHistoryDrawFace: Flag to specify if face is drawn in history mode

Boundaries.Color: Color of agents except ego vehicle
Boundaries.Alpha: Color of agents except ego vehicle

Evaluation.DrawLTLDebugInfo: Flag to specify if debug info to ltl evaluators shall be plotted
Evaluation.DrawRssDebugInfo: Flag to specify if debug info to rss evaluators shall be plotted
Evaluation.DrawRssSafetyResponses: Flag to specify if visualizating rss safety responses.
